bibl.title: Corrigenda to a ‘Dance for a princess’
bibl.seg: Vincent W.J. van Gerven Oei, Corrigenda to a 'Dance for a Princess'.
Corrigenda to: Vincent W. J. van Gerven Oei, A dance for a princess: The legends on a painting in room 5 of the Southwest Annex of the Monastery on Kom H in Dongola, JJurP 47 (2017) pp. 117-135, fig.
bibl.note: Corrigenda to: Vincent W. J. van Gerven Oei, A dance for a princess: The legends on a painting in room 5 of the Southwest Annex of the Monastery on Kom H in Dongola, JJurP 47 (2017) pp. 117-135, fig.
